import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { public texts="text-s"; duname : string =" "; dpw : string =" "; errorMessage : string =" "; vuname: string ='akhila'; vpw : string ='akhila'; constructor(private router: Router) { } public login() { if(this.duname==this.vuname && this.dpw==this.vpw) { this.router.navigate(['/main']); } else{ this.errorMessage="Incorrect UserName and Password"; } } public navigatetoregister() { this.router.navigate(['/register']); } }
